column2: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS

column1: Issued at 12.00 noon on 06 December 2023
Condition of Rain:
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places
column2: in  the  sea  areas  around  the

column1: particularly during the evening or night.

inds:

island. Wind speed may increase up to 40 kmph in the sea areas off the coast extending from Chilaw

column1: to Mullaitivu via Mannar and Kankasanthurai and from Hambanthota to Pottuvil.

tate of Sea:

column2: The sea areas off the coast extending from Chilaw to Trincomalee via Mannar and Kankasanthurai

column1: and from Hambanthota to Pottuvil can be fairly rough at times.
